Key Match Events: Florian Wirtz scored the fastest international goal in history with a strike in just seven seconds.
Kai Havertz scored a goal just after half-time to put Germany in a 2-0 lead.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Christoph Baumgartner saved the initial shot, but Wirtz's follow-up was unstoppable.
France lacked a cutting edge without Antoine Griezmann.
